channel.title: Go on Tadej's bits and bytes
channel.description: Recent content in Go on Tadej's bits and bytes

item.title: My Go setup
item.description:
In this post I’ll describe what I use for writing, linting, formatting, shipping, … Go code. This is a first in a series of posts where I’ll describe my setup in all 3 languages that I code in: Go (this post), Python and C++.

This one will be the most boring one in the series - Go is the most “batteries included” language out of the bunch, so there’s not much to write other than “I use the default thing that Go/standard library provides”.
